creator: AutoScale, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
"SocialDog", a smart and efficient Twitter account management tools
iPhone app of SocialDog, a Twitter account management tools with various Twitter account management features, is finally here!
◆ Highly recommended for all users that wants to grow their Twitter account, including (but not limited to): companies, restaurants, official accounts of stores,
YouTuber and influencers, such as bloggers
◆ Recommended for cases such as:
- Schedule Tweets
- Follow and Unfollow easily
- Manage multiple Twitter accounts
- Check the Follower trend in graph
- Looking for app that can be used for free
◆ Features
● Scheduled Tweets
Automatically post Tweets at specified date and time.
Also works with posts with images!
● Notification of Unfollow
Not available on the official Twitter app!
See which of your Followers unfollowered you and get notified.
● Follower Management
Manage Followers based on detailed criteria.
"Fan"
Follow users that have Followed you but you haven't Followed-back
"Not Followed"
Unfollow users that you have Followed but haven't Followed you back
"Inactive"
Unfollow users that are inactive and haven't Tweeted for some time
"Keyword Follow"
Follow users with specified keywords
"Follower Copy"
Follow the Followred of your competitors' Twitter account
● Dashboard
See number of existing Followers, new Followers, Unfollows in easy-to-see beautiful graphs.
● Inbox
Set keywords and collect Tweets containg the keywords setted
◆ About the Basic Plan
SocialDog has a paid membership plan called Basic Plan.
SocialDog will be usable with limited features during Free Plan.
The unlock more feature, please upgrade to Basic Plan.
● Basic Plan
Fee: 1,280JPY/Month
(14-day Free Trial available)

Features that will be unlocked with Basic Plan:
- Lift the limit of Follows per Day to: 1,000
- Lift the limited of Unfollow per Day to: 1,000
- Lift the limited of Likes per Day to: 100
- Lift the limited of Retweets per Day to: 100
- Lift the limited of New Follows per Day to: 100
- Protected / Hidden List
- Advanced Follower management feature
- Mute block
- Advanced filters
- Advanced sorting
- Lift the limit of Keyword Monitors to: 10
- Scheduled Tweets: 30
- Post Schedule: 35
● The free trial period of the Basic Plan
Users that subscribe via iTunes Store for the 1st time will get a free trial.
If the subscription does not get cancelled 24 hours before the free trial period expires, Basic Plan is auto-renewalled and the monthly fee will be charged.
● Auto-renewal Billing
When you confirm the subscription, you will be charged via the iTunes account.
Basic plan is an auto-renewal subscrition plan.
If the subscription does not get cancelled 24 hours before the free trial period expires, Basic Plan is auto-renewalled and the monthly fee will be charged.
If you cancel the subscription, the subscription will remain active until the subscription period ends.
In that case, the auto-renewal will be disabled and existing subscription will not be refunded.
The features unlocked by Basic Plan will be active during the subscription period.
The unused portion of the free trial period will expire when subscribing.
● Restoration after device change
When you changed your device, you can restore the Paid Plan that was previously purchased for free.
[Upper left corner of the screen of the user's icon] -> [upper left of the gear icon] -> tap the [Plan], please logged in to the iTunes of the iPhone/iPad device with the same AppleID used at the time of purchase.
● Confirmation and Cancellation
Select [Recommended] at the botoom of App Store app -> [Apple ID]
-> "Display your Apple ID" -> [Subscribe] -> select SocialDog from [Management].
Confirma the next renewal date from this screen, you can unsubscribe / set subscription
● Notes
- Those who subscribed via app cannot cancel other than the way mentioned above.
- We do not accept cancellation of the month subscribed
● Terms
https://web.social-dog.net/docs/tos
● Privacy Policy
https://web.social-dog.net/docs/privacy
descriptionShort: Smart and efficient Twitter account management tools

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Added support for English !!

The app has been updated to improvement of performance of Follower Management and Scheduled Posts!
Schduling Retweets and Replies are also available now!

Thank you for always using SocialDog.
We updated SocialDog on regular basis to improve the performance of the app.
Please continue to user and support SocialDog.

title: SocialDog for Twitter

creator: AutoScale, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
SocialDog is a smart and efficient Twitter account management tool.

● Recommended for
- Users who want to grow their Twitter account, including (but not limited to): companies, restaurants, stores, YouTubers, influencers, and bloggers.
- Users that would like to:
Schedule Tweets
Follow and unfollow accounts easily
Manage multiple Twitter accounts
View graphs of their follower trends
Be able to manage their accounts with a free app

● Features
- Scheduled Tweets
Automatically post Tweets at a specified date and time.
Also works with posts that include images!
- Receive unfollow notifications
View which of your Followers unfollowed you and receive notifications.
Not available in the official Twitter app!
- Follower management
Manage Followers based on specific criteria.
"Fan"
Users that follow you, but you not follow you back
"Not Followed"
Users that you follow, but do not follow you back
"Inactive"
Users that are inactive and haven't Tweeted for some time
- Dashboard
View your number of existing followers, new followers, and unfollows with easy-to-see beautiful graphs
- Inbox
Set keywords and collect Tweets containing the keywords specified
- RSS Auto Tweet
Automatically send tweets from registered RSS feeds
- Manage multiple twitter accounts

● Terms of Service
https://web.social-dog.net/docs/tos

● Privacy Policy
https://web.social-dog.net/docs/privacy
descriptionShort: Smart and efficient Twitter account management tools

creator: SocialDog, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
SocialDog is a smart and efficient Twitter account management tool.

● Recommended for
- Users who want to grow their Twitter account, including (but not limited to): companies, restaurants, stores, YouTubers, influencers, and bloggers.

Schedule Tweets
Follow and unfollow accounts easily
Manage multiple Twitter accounts
View graphs of their follower trends
Be able to manage their accounts with a free app

● Features
- Scheduled Tweets
Automatically post Tweets at a specified date and time.
Also works with posts that include images!
- Receive unfollow notifications
View which of your Followers unfollowed you and receive notifications.
Not available in the official Twitter app!
- Follower management
Manage Followers based on specific criteria.
"Fan"
Users that follow you, but you not follow you back
"Not Followed"
Users that you follow, but do not follow you back
"Inactive"

- Dashboard
View your number of existing followers, new followers, and unfollows with easy-to-see beautiful graphs
- Inbox
Set keywords and collect Tweets containing the keywords specified
- RSS Auto Tweet
Automatically send tweets from registered RSS feeds
- Manage multiple twitter accounts

title: SocialDog for Twitter

creator: SocialDog, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Check the SocialDog website to find out how to start using SocialDog!

What can you do with SocialDog?

Scheduled posting
- Tweet automatically at a specified date and time.
- Also supports posts with images.

New follower/unfollow notifications
- Find out when someone follows or unfollows you.

Follower management
- Comprehensively manage followers with fine-grained follower management features.
- See if users have followed you back or not at a glance.

Dashboard
- View graphs of follower, new follower, and unfollowed numbers.
- Data is retrieved automatically by our servers so there's no need to open the app every day.

Inbox
- Register keywords to collect matching Tweets.

● Terms of Service
https://web.social-dog.net/docs/tos

● Privacy Policy
https://web.social-dog.net/docs/privacy

Note:
When using SocialDog in accordance with Twitter's rules, your account will not become suspended or be deleted.
As outlined in Twitter's rules, both actions performed by users on their account, and actions performed on applications linked to their account are ultimately the responsibility of the user.
SocialDog performs actions such as posting Tweets based on user operation. Tweet-related actions performed through SocialDog must also adhere to Twitter's rules.

To report an issue or make a request, please contact us using the contact form.
[Top left user icon] > [Bottom left cog icon] > [Contact]
descriptionShort: Smart and efficient Twitter account management tools

- Data is retrieved automatically by our servers so there's no need to open the app every day.

Inbox
- Register keywords to collect matching Posts.
